derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the sense 'compelling, convincing'): from Latin stringent- 'drawing tight', from the verb stringere

entry.tran: (法律、规则、条件)严格的，严厉的，受严格约束的
entry.def: Stringent laws, rules, or conditions are very severe or are strictly controlled.

example.ex: He announced that there would be more stringent controls on the possession of weapons...
example.tran: 他宣布将对武器的持有实行更严格的控制。

example.ex: Its  drugtesting procedures are the most stringent in the world.
example.tran: 其药物检测程序是世界上最严格的。

means.word_mean: 1. demanding strict attention to rules and procedures;
